txt.en: You should help Merúd collect pebbles and a piece of driftwood.\n\nThese can be found along Melgobas' shore.

'I did not think you would come back. Thank you. If my son were here, he would thank you too; I made sure he had good manners, after all.

'The Corsairs took him away, but the sea claimed him in the end. I have nothing to bury but this crate of seashells from his childhood...'

She utters no more words. Instead, she picks up her shovel and continues digging.

The old woman barely pauses to acknowledge your presence. 'No, I do not require help,' she intones, as if she's repeated these words to others before.

She continues digging for a while longer before finally speaking up again.

'Hmph. A stubborn one, aren't you? Let me work in peace. If you truly wish to help, then find me some pebbles and a piece of driftwood. There should be plenty along the beach here.'
You have collected enough pebbles and driftwood.\n\nYou should return to Merúd at Melgobas' shore.
